body: Stuwin.ai doesn’t just check your tasks and grade your knowledge. It analyzes how you think and how you learn — identifying your strengths and weaknesses, and the best direction for growth.

features.title: Real-time 'Neural Map'
features.description: With every check, AI monitors your response style and pinpoints exactly how information is being perceived.

features.title: Precise Gap Detection
features.description: We don't just say 'right/wrong' — we find the hidden gaps hindering your knowledge growth.

features.title: Dynamic Feedback
features.description: Provides instant, personalized recommendations — helping you move from confusion to clarity faster.
